Actions.Name: Spirit Scythe
Actions.Effects: Attack target is branded and shoved 1 in any direction. This effect also applies to frostbitten foes in the area.

Actions.Name: Lonely Dead
Actions.Description: The Thannir summons a lonely soul in range 4.

Summons.Name: Lonely Soul
Summons.SummonActions: When summoned, or once a round on the Thannir's turn thereafter, may move 3 spaces and deal 2 piercing damage to an adjacent foe. If that foe is branded or marked, the soul can also then shove the foe 1.

Actions.Name: Rune of the Spring Flower
Actions.Description: The Thannir marks an ally in range 4.
Actions.Mark: After the marked ally takes damage, they gain vigor 1 and may dash 2. At the end of the round, or after this effect is triggered, remove this mark.

Actions.Name: Rune of the Grave
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 must save or be marked. On a successful save, they are pacified.
Actions.Mark: While marked, a character is frostbitten, cannot benefit from defiance, loses all vigor at the end of each turn, and cannot gain vigor. A character can end this mark by spending an entire turn not attacking.

Actions.Name: Lay To Rest
Actions.Description: The Thannir chooses a foe in range 3 that is at 25% hp or less. That foe must save or be instantly defeated. On a successful save, they are reduced to 1 hp.
